title: METHOD FOR CREATING A FIBROUS SUBSTANCE SUSPENSION USED FOR PRODUCING A TISSUE WEB OR HYGIENE WEB
abstract: The invention relates to a method for creating a fibrous substance suspension used for producing a tissue web or hygiene web, during which the fibers obtained in the fiber suspension are, in an online process, directly loaded with a loading material in the tissue preparation line by a chemical precipitation reaction.

motivations: There is a need for an efficient method to create a fibrous substance suspension for producing tissue or hygiene webs.
objectives: Develop a method for creating a fibrous substance suspension through direct loading of fibers with a loading material in an online process.
methods: Utilize a chemical precipitation reaction to load fibers with a loading material in the tissue preparation line.
results: Enable the efficient production of tissue or hygiene webs through an optimized fibrous substance suspension creation process.

motivations: There is a need for an efficient method to create a fibrous substance suspension used for producing a tissue web or hygiene web.
objectives: Develop a method where fibers obtained in the fiber suspension are directly loaded with a loading material in the tissue preparation line by a chemical precipitation reaction.
methods: Use an online process to directly load the fibers obtained in the fiber suspension with a loading material in the tissue preparation line.
Employ a chemical precipitation reaction for the loading process.
results: Expected to create a more efficient process for producing a tissue web or hygiene web.
openai_json.research_subject: Method for creating a fibrous substance suspension for tissue or hygiene web production

motivations: There is a need for improved methods to create fibrous substance suspensions for tissue and hygiene web production that allow for direct material loading during the manufacturing process.
objectives: Develop a method for creating fibrous substance suspensions that enables direct loading of fibers with materials through chemical precipitation in an online process.
methods: Implement an online chemical precipitation reaction process to directly load fibers with loading materials during tissue preparation.
results: Enable the production of tissue and hygiene webs with fibers that are directly loaded with materials during the suspension creation process.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Online chemical loading of fibers in tissue and hygiene web production
